title: LoLpatcherUX stuck at 75%
body: So I have a MacBook Pro running the latest version, and every time when I try and install LoL it always freezes at a random number. I have tried more than several times and currently it's 3:50am so I did leave it over night but it froze sometime while I was asleep. This is getting really aggravating as I really want to play. Anyone know how to unfreeze it from 75% Applying Patches???

replies.body:
Issues at this stage (and anything after 33%) are caused by your patcher losing its connection to our patching servers. Since this is commonly caused by conflicting network settings, I'd recommend working through our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) as your first step.

Let me know if those steps caused any change.

Greetings,

Try to leave the patcher for awhile, it might actually take awhile. If it's still not loading restart your patcher and run league of legends as an administrator, if that doesn't work do this:

Navigate the following two folders in your league of legends folder and delete them:

C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\RADS\downloads
C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\RADS\solutions

And let me know if it works.

Best wishes, A Kat Main {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
